none.comment: Add back allowedResourceTypes in bulk export
modified changelogs compatible for rush for persistence

patch.comment: Validate length of dynamodb hash id for incoming request
sanitized error messages to exclude user input

major.comment: - Support for DB export by implementing BulkDataAccess interfaces in `fhir-works-on-aws-interface` v3.0.0
- BREAKING CHANGE: This change will not be successful if sort key is still a String

minor.comment: - feat: Assume that the Resource DDB sort key is a number not a String
